name: Cyberjunk Online
description:
Ride the streets of Trash City with your friends. Pick from two paths, the streets or the Trash City PD. Create your own character, and customize it from hair color to outfit. Choose either to cause havoc to the streets of Trash City, or to bring justice! Pick from an arsenal of various weapons, as well as different cars to ride around. Explore the map, race with friends, or play the soccer minigame. 

See you in the big leagues!
